content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EAC and Active Directory Users and Computers console (available at SD Admin Terminal Server) are fully interrelated. To speak plainly, in everyday work SD members use EAC to create a number of new entities, which are in our responsibility (e.g. distributions groups), and then use both EAC and AD console to manage entities (e.g. update distribution group membership).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"E.g. User account renaming will be performed in EAC, but domain password is reset through AD Console at SD Admin Terminal Server.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Details on what console to use are provided in the respective instructions and KB articles.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
